abstract: A little more than a week into the New Year, our whole team returned to us — including one particular employee with a heartwarming story.
snippet: A little more than a week into the New Year, our whole team returned to us — including one particular employee with a heartwarming story.
lead_paragraph: In a recent post, I discussed an issue many Chinese companies cope with after New Year’s break: the loss of staff members. In 2012, my auction company, iPai, lost two staff members. In 2013, we lost three. In a small company, that can be a significant loss.
